::FireBlade::
Still FireBlade did not turn...The taunts only made him even angrier..
and the shots felt like bugs smackin him even tho his armor was
beginning to get fairly damaged.And the faster he killed Prowl the
faster he could kill the rest of this annoying Faction. His SGL
(shoulder grenade launcher) turned around and fired an emp and two
FireGrenades back at Khonker...
